comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
comments.body: Added init-dist target and had package and package-*-src call it so that it always builds the dist dir.

description:
package-tgz-src and package-zip-src fail if ${dist.dir} does not exist, since these two targets do not call the package target, which is responsible for making the dir.

I have a fix and will commit shortly.
summary: Source packaging fails if ${dist.dir} does not exist
